names.english: strengthen the spleen and remove excess decoction
names.commonEnglish: Strengthen the SPleen and Remove Excess Decoction

actions: It is a strong diuretic and is primarily used for edema.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
Reduces rebellious Stomach Qi while clearing Heat agitation.
Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure, resolves hardenings and removes stagnated food.
Promotes urination, reduces edema and clears Damp Heat.
Strengthens the Spleen, resolves Dampness and clears Damp-Heat.
With Fu Ling Pi, for Spleen Deficiency with Excess Dampness and edema.
Reduces Food Stagnation, improves digestion and strengthens the Stomach.
With Gu Ya, restores normal appetite.
Reduces Food Stagnation, promotes digestion, strengthens and opens the Stomach, harmonizes the Center, strengthens the Spleen and encourages the appetite.

symptoms: The disease is of long duration
Lesions presenting as discrete pale red or dull red maculae or papules
Scaling and crusting occur as the lesions dry
